articles.title: Average Boston rent down for first time in years — but still over $3K
articles.description:
is used to specify article abstract. You can only provide plain text in this element. --> Vacancies are the highest they’ve been since the COVID-19 pandemic, but the city’s average asking rent still clocked in at $3,043 in October, according to Bloomberg.

The post Average Boston rent down for first time in years — but still over $3K appeared first on Boston.com.
